thread.title: Spanish giants Barcelona invest in Rwanda with new academy
thread.title_full: Spanish giants Barcelona invest in Rwanda with new academy

title: Spanish giants Barcelona invest in Rwanda with new academy
text:
10:40 CET Spanish giants Barcelona invest in Rwanda with new academy - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Spanish giants Barcelona will invest in Rwanda by building a brand new academy in the East African country. 
The $10-million RG Football Academy will be modelled on Barcelona's famous youth academy, La Masia, which has been singled out as one of the best of its kind in the world. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Fixing the economy is not only about the who, what or how- it is the combined three. By: Abraham Sedoame
